description: Python module providing functions to load and validate static JSON datasets from a configured data directory, with caching and error handling.

methods.name: _data_dir
methods.description: Returns the data directory path from settings, resolved to an absolute path.

methods.name: _validate_filename
methods.description: Validates filename to prevent path traversal and ensure it ends with .json extension.

methods.name: load_dataset
methods.description: Loads a JSON dataset by filename from the data directory, with caching and error handling.

methods.name: list_datasets
methods.description: Lists all available JSON dataset files in the data directory.

methods.name: get_ca_adjacency_vs_ca
methods.description: Retrieves the primary 'Adjacency vs CA' dataset, trying preferred filenames.

methods.name: get_adjacency_matrix
methods.description: Retrieves the adjacency matrix dataset, trying preferred filenames.
